structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

text.section: Any person who violates any of the provisions of KRS 250.021 to 250.111 or KRS 250.361 to 250.461 shall be fined not less than one hundred dollars ($100), nor more than seven hundred fifty dollars ($750).

Any person who shall impede, hinder, or otherwise prevent, or attempt to prevent, the director or his duly authorized agent in the performance of his duty in connection with this chapter, shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor.
Any person who violates subsection (6) of KRS 250.601 shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor.

Except as provided by subsection (3) of this section, any person who violates any of the provisions of KRS 250.491 to 250.631 may be fined up to one thousand dollars ($1,000) for the third and subsequent violations made within a twenty-four (24) month period.
